alert.note: Alert for Central Cook; Eastern Will; Northern Will; Southern Cook; Southern Will (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 2:29PM CST until January 10 at 4:00AM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow and hazardous travel conditions expected. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches away from the lake. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Central Cook, Southern Cook, Northern Will, Southern Will and Eastern Will Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could become difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.

area.areaDesc: Central Cook; Eastern Will; Northern Will; Southern Cook; Southern Will
